stripped_text: click: Look at the top X cards of your stack and arrange them in any order. X is the number of copies of Spy Camera installed. trash: Look at the top card of R&D. Limit 6 per deck.
text:
[click]: Look at the top X cards of your stack and arrange them in any order. X is the number of copies of Spy Camera installed.
[trash]: Look at the top card of R&D.
Limit 6 per deck.
title: Spy Camera
